issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Since the refactored version of APSAnalytics was included in Titanium SDK Ti.Cloudpush needs some minor adjustments to work properly. TiPlatformHelper is no longer extending the removed APSAnalyticsHelper, so APSAnalyticsInfo abstract methods are overwritten directly from aps-analytics.
fields.summary: Android: Ti.Cloudpush needs a few adjustments to work with the refactored APSanalytics
